name: MUX Protocol
about: MUX Leveraged Trading Protocol - A decentralized leveraged trading protocol that offers zero price impact trading, , no counterparty risks for traders and an optimized on-chain trading experience. A sub-protocol in the MUX protocol suite that automatically selects the most suitable liquidity route and minimizes the composite cost for traders while meeting the needs of opening positions
